# MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle

**Enumeration**

A value that specifies a style for the outside of the text.

## Declaration

```swift
enum MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle
```

## Constants

- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.undefined**: An edge style has not been specified.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.none**: The text should not have a styled edge.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.raised**: An edge makes the text appear to rise above the background.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.depressed**: An edge makes the text appear pushed in.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.uniform**: A thin outline lies along the edge of the text.
- **MACaptionAppearanceTextEdgeStyle.dropShadow**: An edge makes the text appear to float above the background.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **MACaptionAppearanceDomain**: A value that specifies which domain to retrieve a preference setting from.
- **MACaptionAppearanceDisplayType**: A value that specifies the type of captions to display.
- **MACaptionAppearanceBehavior**: A value that indicates the preferred behavior for a preference setting.
- **MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle**: A value that specifies a font style.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
